ConfigurationOption.Value: select s.assetnum, coalesce( e.code, s.start_code ) code, s.start_wo, s.start_operational, s.start_date, e.wonum end_wo, e.operational end_operational, e.changedate end_date, s.siteid, s.startstatusid, s.endstatusid from ( select s.assetnum, s.wonum start_wo, s.code start_code, s.operational start_operational, s.changedate start_date, s.siteid, s.assetstatusid startstatusid, (select min(assetstatusid) from assetstatus where assetstatusid > s. assetstatusid and isrunning = 1 and assetnum = s.assetnum) endstatusid from assetstatus s where s.isrunning = 0) s left join assetstatus e on e.assetstatusid = s.endstatusid
:=test(${Start Date} <= ${LAST_START_DATE}, 'last start date is less', 'last start date is greater')
The reported downtime conflicts with an existing downtime record.

Struct._value: := test( ${End Work Order} is not null, query( "Work Orders", "workorderid", " 'Work Order' = ${End Work Order} and Site = ${Site}" ), null )
:= test( ${Start Work Order} is not null, query( "Work Orders", "workorderid", " 'Work Order' = ${Start Work Order} and Site = ${Site}" ), null )
:= test( ${End Work Order} is not null, query( "Work Orders", "workorderid", " 'Work Order' = ${End Work Order} and Site = ${Site}" ), null )
